text: (TITLE CARD: The Diary of a_Teenage Girl)
MINNIE GOETZE, an intensely smart fifteen-year-old, curio and strong but not jaded, walks through the seedy sprawli park. Minnie’s voice-over, recorded onto a cassette tape:

I had sex today. HOLY SHIIIITTTTT! Music kicks in - something with a beat. Minnie walks seriously down the path, until the chorus chimes in, then shimmies, or swishes her hips, in time to the music. Minnie’s POV: A boy with blond feathered hair takes a lon slow puff off of a joint. Smoke wafts up around his face, dancing with his curls almost magically. Minnie bounds through the park, past old strung-out hippi lounging in the grass. One of the women doesn’t have a sh on. This is the 70s in San Francisco - it’s just how it i A young woman jogs by in a skimpy seventies jogging outfi Her unharnessed breasts bounce happily along. Comic stars appear on her nipples and bounce away. Minnie looks down takes a quick peek at her own less ample breasts.  Pink (01/08/2014) 2. She struts to the music. She leaves animated footsteps in path. Minnie does a little skip, and the music swells and cuts EXT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - STREET 3 Minnie runs up and into a Victorian style apartment build INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - THE LIVING ROOM - CONTINUOUS 5 Minnie enters, startled to find her mom, CHARLOTTE, a hip woman of 34 who wishes she were 25, and GRETEL, 13 and a Charlotte, pretty and girly, glued to the TV. Charlotte i still beautiful, though she wears her mistakes on her bod She sips a gin and tonic. On the TV, news coverage of the trial of Patty Hearst.

Patty Hearst, the kidnapped heiress whose story has riveted the world, appeared in court again today. She was described as pallid, dull in complexion and lacking in energy. One court reporter described her demeanor as “zombie-like”. Minnie tries to sneak past unnoticed. The room is complet with shag carpeting wall-to-wall, hanging ferns, and colo afghans. The picture of Patty Hearst with a gun is on the TV ANCHOR(CONT’D) When Ms. Hearst was asked to describe the closet that her captors held her in...
Oh Minnie. Come watch with us.
(trying to sound grown-up) Yeah. It’s history in the making. Charlotte doesn’t take her eyes off the TV.
Prosecutors brought in Dr. Harry L. Kozol, an expert on sex-offenders and mentally ill criminals...
No thanks.
(re: TV) She's not mentally ill! Fuck this guy. Just because she ran away from her bourgeoisie family and started over. I know how you feel, Patty! Charlotte sips her drink, Minnie leans in.
My teacher said she was brainwashed. I mean, didn’t they, like, keep her in a closet?
No, come on. She’s brave. She reminds me of my friend Andrea- she’s searching for something more real than her privileged bullshit childhood.
Oh.
I think she’s a phony. What kind of person falls in love with the people who kidnap and torture them? Charlotte and Gretel turn toward Minnie, surprised. Charl finally takes in Minnie:
Is that what you wore today?
Mom?!
I’m just saying. It wouldn’t kill you to wear something with a waist. Jeez. Gretel laughs.
(to Gretel) Shut the fuck up. Charlotte goes back to watching the coverage.
I’m gonna go do homework. Minnie exits. Charlotte calls after her.

Kimmie called. Charlotte and Gretel go back to the TV. INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS 6 Minnie pulls the rotary phone into her messy room and dia frantically. The bed is unmade, a record player sits on t floor in the corner, and the dresser’s drawers hang open loosely exposing their contents. There are half finished projects everywhere: dioramas, a photography corner, etc.

(into phone) Hi, may I speak to Kimmie please? Oh, okay. Yeah could you just ask her to call Minnie the moment she get in? Thanks. Minnie hangs up, frustrated. INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - HALLWAY - MOMENTS LATER 7 Minnie digs frantically through the closet, searching. Sh flings articles of clothes, and tennis rackets out of the way, boxes fall on her, until she finds what she’s lookin for: a seventies cassette recorder complete with a microphone. She wipes dust off of it. INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BEDROOM —- MOMENTS LATER 8 Minnie presses record on the tape recorder, noticing some dark dried blood on her index finger. She picks at it for moment, smells it. She thinks about where to begin. Then, jumps up, locks her door. She sits back down.
(into mic) Um. Testing? No - Fuck - (MORE )

(rewinds, starts again) My name is Minnie Goetze. I ama fifteen-year-old girl living in San Francisco California, recording this onto a cassette tape because my life has gotten really crazy of late, and I need to tell someone about it. If you’re listening to this without my permission, please stop right now. Just, really. Stop. Okay. (clearing her throat) So, I don’t remember being born.
A comic-book style animation: a woman’s naked body lying her side breaths and move in sketchy pencil lines. She mo in ecstacy.

I was a very ugly child. Her knees part slowly, opening seductively, exposing a ha crotch, the pencil lines of the pubic hair going in every direction. Her toes curl, and suddenly through the center her legs pops out the head of a baby, who looks just like Minnie- bright-eyed and smiling. The animation freezes:
INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS 10 Minnie stands with her tape recorder and microphone. The “birth drawing” is tacked to the wall in front of her.
My appearance has not improved so I suppose it was a lucky break when he was attracted by my youthfulness. A cat starts purring around Minnie’s ankle, she picks him roughly, kissing him.

Domino, you stupid cat, I love you. (then, whispering) Hey, Domino. Do I look different than I did yesterday?  11 Domino squirms and jumps out of her arms. Minnie flops on bed, a huge grin coming over her face. The walls of Minnie’s room are lined with comic-style drawings, and photographs: a tongue, or a face, homeless people, and transvestites. And many self-portraits. Minni speaks into her mic.
(getting serious) Okay in all matter of factuality, it happened like this:

INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - THE LIVING ROOM - NIGHT 11 Charlotte is sprawled out on the couch, a lit joint dangl precariously in her fingers, falling asleep. Gretel eats bowl of ice-cream on the floor. MONROE, 34, a guy with th attitude and libido of a 15 year old, sits on the end of couch and stares blankly at The Carol Burnett Show on the drinking a Schlitz beer. Minnie enters in a blue little-girl nightgown, plopping d on the couch, moving her mom’s legs over. Charlotte groan and ashes from her joint fall into Gretel’s bowl of ice- cream.
Mom!? God. You’re so gross. I can’t even watch TV without... Gretel gets up in a huff, and exits. Charlotte doesn’t st The TV blares.

My mother was married for a long time to my step-dad Pascal. He is a science-y guy, a PhD. C/U on a picture of Charlotte and PASCAL, 45, when they w younger and married. Even then, they were an odd match.
He has a lot of ideas about how the world works- doesn’t think women should drink or smoke. Minnie looks at the joint in her mom’s hand.  Yellow (01/16/2014) 7.
Maybe that’s why she isn’t married to him anymore. She’s “looser” now. Minnie looks toward Monroe.

Monroe Rutherford’s her boyfriend, but they aren’t possessive. Monroe stares at the TV. He is handsome in this light, wi boyish face. He feels Minnie looking at him and smiles a little. Minnie turns back to the TV. There is a long paus Charlotte suddenly startles.
(half-asleep and a little high) What?
It was the TV. Whatdyasay?
It was just the TV, mom.
Oh my god, I had such a long day. I'm falling asleep here. Charlotte slips her house shoes on without opening her ey CHARLOTTE (CONT’D) I’m crashin’. Monroe slaps Charlotte on the ass.
G’night.

Night. Minnie debates moving over to the other side of the couch but just as she makes a move, Monroe puts his big hand on head. Minnie hits Monroe lightly. He puts his arm around and they curl up together, watching TV.

What are you wearing? This nightgown is totally ridiculous. Minnie blushes.  12 Pink (01/08/2014) 8. Monroe’s arm dangles around Minnie’s shoulder, dangerousl close to her breast. Maybe his hand brushes it? They sit silence watching the TV. Minnie moves to the other side o the couch, staring at Monroe.

I know it seems weird, but I had this strangely calming feeling that even if he touched my tit on purpose it's probably all right because he's one of our best friends and he's a good guy and he knows how it goes and I don't... Minnie looks at Monroe for a sign. Monroe cracks another beer.
But I wonder if my breast felt small?
INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BEDROOM - NIGHT 12 Minnie looks at a picture she drew of Monroe, in very sho jogging shorts, that is tacked onto the wall. Her tape pl in her hand.

Oh Monroe. Pitter pat. You touched my tit. How was that? Minnie touches Monroe’s crotch on the drawing. As she sta deep into Monroe’s face turns to camera,, so handsome and charming. His eyes twitch with mischief. He looks down a little, then back up.
(so vulnerable) Can I just say- touching your breasts... (bashfully, almost) I can’t- I can’t say it. (MORE )

(then) They're really great. Fantastic breasts, Minnie. Just perfect. Monroe smiles. Comic book flowers burst out from behind h head, like a seventies album cover. A bird flies out of h ear and lands on top of his head and starts singing, and
INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - KITCHEN - EVENING 13 Monroe snaps his fingers in Minnie’s face. She is standin with the door of the fridge wide open, staring into space
Weirdo. Minnie pushes Monroe, playfully but hard.

It feels so good to imagine that he might be thinking about me. Like finally I exist. Monroe grabs an apple, bites into it. The kitchen has a paisley wallpaper lining the walls, and avocado green til on the counters.
So- Charlotte enters the kitchen, in a sexy house-dress/robe.
(to Charlotte) Hey. You ‘bout ready steady? Monroe jumps up and sits on the counter.
No, no. I think I’m staying here. I’m already in my skivvies.
What? You promised.
Not that I love him or anything. I’m not stupid. Gretel enters, and Charlotte pours herself a big gin and tonic.  Yellow (01/16/2014) 10.
We're gonna watch “Little House on the Prairie”. Gretel grabs a soda from the fridge. Charlotte smooths Gretel’s hair a little.
Yep. Monroe grabs Charlotte by the waist and pulls her close.
It’s two-for-one Tuesdays, though. You promised.
I’m sorry, baby.
Let’s just go for a few drinks? I need to get out.
I'll make it up to you, I swear. I’m sorry. Take Minnie.
What?
Minnie’ll go. Wontcha’ Min?
She doesn’t want to go.
Yeah I do. Where?
Told you. See? Charlotte turns and leaves with Gretel.
Just this bar on Harrison.
I had homework, but so the fuck what? Monroe smiles, it’s a plan.

At a tall bar table in a dark corner, a bartender drops o another round to Minnie and Monroe. They’re both pleasant drunk, watch the bartender leave. Monroe leans his body i Minnie’s, almost knocking her off her stool.  11. She laughs, pushing him, but then almost falls off her st He catches her.

(teasing) Whoa! Clumsy clumsy. He helps her back onto her stool, holding onto her for a little too long. Minnie gets a case of the giggles, he follows suit. They play a game of “sugarpack football”, flicking a suga pack across the table, trying to make it land on the edge the table. Monroe flicks the sugar packet through Minnie’ “field-goal” (her hands) and it disappears off the table.
Shit. Where’d it go? Monroe gets up and starts rooting around on the ground ne her feet, looking for it. He bites her ankle. She screams loud. He laughs.
Shut up! You lightweight. He bites her calf, grabbing onto her knee. Minnie takes h hand, and bites it hard. He stands, letting her bite him.
That doesn’t hurt?
You can’t hurt me. Go ahead.
I’m gonna bite you so fucking hard. She bites it even harder, as hard as she can.
I don’t even feel it.
You're drunk.
I’m just really strong. She bites his finger. He likes it. He thinks about touchi her face. She breathes in, wanting him to. He flicks her nose. He sits back down.  Green (01/19/2014) 12.
You're far away.
(quietly) You just gave me a hard-on.
I did? She peers over the table to see.
Yeah, I’m hard. Minnie might laugh but instead she moves closer. Glancing around, Monroe takes Minnie’s hand and puts it d his pants. Minnie feels it, interested like it’s a scienc experiment.
It didn’t feel too hard to me. It had soft skin. I don't know what I expected exactly but I guess flesh can never be really hard, like wood or Formica. Monroe moans quietly, Minnie smiles.
I want you to fuck me.
I didn’t even know if I was serious or not, but it was funny and I was drunk. Monroe removes her hand.
You're shit-faced. I gotta get you back to your goddmamn mother. But he doesn’t move away, if anything he pulls her closer searching her eyes.
I can’t believe you want me to fuck you. Do you really want me to fuck you?  15 16 Yellow (01/16/2014) 13.
(playfully) None of your fucking business. It’s like a game of chicken, neither will look away. Even this moment, there is nothing threatening about Monroe.
You really do want me to fuck you, don’t you? You really fucking want me to fucking fuck you. Minnie stares up at Monroe’s face, smiling.
I didn’t know whether I wanted him or anyone else to fuck me but I was afraid to pass up the chance because I may never get another.
Minnie and Monroe get into the car, unsure of what’s next They stare straight ahead. Then they go for it. He kisses her, for a long time, sliding his hand between her legs. Music crescendos.

INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BATHROOM - LATER THAT NIGHT 16 Minnie is in the bathtub, staring at the ceiling, where shadows from the street dance. She touches her lips and mouth, which are raw and red from Monroe’s stubble.

It tasted like heated wine - hot and sticky and the inside of his mouth was all smooth. I tried giving him a blow-job in the car and he put his hand in me, and touched my tits. He said he wanted to fuck me, but he said we can’t tonight.
(every emotion) Oh my god. Oh my god. Oh my god. Minnie dips her head back in the water, letting her hair all around her.  17 18 Green (01/19/2014) 14.

Sometimes the feeling of water rushing through my hair makes me feel so beautiful. Like a mermaid waiting to be rescued from the depths of the sea. Minnie enjoys this feeling, and then suddenly opens her e with a start:
Is this what it feels like for someone to love you? He could have anyone and he wants me. He sees me. I feel different today. I never want to go back.

Minnie waits on the corner of Jackson and Scott, anxious. MAN WITH A BUSHY MUSTACHE, and tight bell-bottoms whistle her. Monroe pulls up, and she gets into his beat-up car, flipping off the stranger with a smile.
You gonna get in trouble for skipping school? Minnie shakes her head, smiling.
You feel like sandwiches? Minnie nods. They drive off.

Monroe and Minnie fall into the small bachelor apartment making out, barely closing the door behind them. Monroe l Minnie up onto the bed. He gets on top of Minnie, kissing and unbuttons her pants. Minnie is scared but excited. Minutes later, Minnie and Monroe lie silently side-by-sid the bed. They both have their shirts and jackets on still and are naked just from the waist down. Minnie traces an Monroe's leg in blood. He shakes his head in disbelief.
What?
I didn’t know you were a virgin.  19 15. He shakes it off. Minnie closes her eyes, peaceful.
You look good, you know? Nice.
I do? Minnie reaches for her backpack and pulls out her Polaroi camera.
Will you take my picture? She lies back down, resuming her position.
What?
Please? I just want to see. He snaps the picture, against his better judgement. Minni points the camera toward Monroe, but he grabs it out of h hand.
Nah, nah, nah. Are you crazy? Minnie gives in, shaking her picture in her hand.
You better not show that picture to anyone. CLOSE ON the photograph of Minnie, still and beautiful.
You can’t even see where I am. Outside, life continues. School lets out, transvestites t tricks, the city lives.
INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BEDROOM - DAY 19 We are back where we started, Minnie’s first Diary entry. Minnie sits with her tape recorder now on the floor.  20 Pink (01/08/2014) 16.
...That was about an hour ago and I can’t believe I’ve now actually said it out loud. I’m pretty sure this makes me officially an adult. Right? She picks at the dried blood on her finger.

I’m going to continue recording this diary with the intention of making entries each and every day as honestly and as sincerely as is possible for me to do. She presses stop, pleased. She pulls out the picture that Monroe took of her after her first time and examines it. looks relaxed and beautiful. INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - KITCHEN/HALLWAY - ANOTHER EVENING 2 Minnie is sitting at the kitchen table drawing a picture herself when the doorbell rings. She jumps up. As Minnie heads for the door, Gretel comes out of her roo
I'll get it. Minnie slams Gretel’s door in her face.
I got it. Gretel whines. Minnie opens the front door.
(shyly) Hey.
(shyly) Hey. There is a tense pause. They stare at each other. Monroe seems like a teenager who doesn’t know what to say.
Your mom here?  17.
No. (then, jealous) Why? Did you come to see her?
No.
Oh. Monroe enters sheepishly, punches Minnie’s shoulder playfully.
I came to see you, silly. Minnie punches Monroe on his arm, hard.
Ow. Shit. You got a good arm. You wanna box?
Yeah. They put up their dukes and start circling each other, jabbing and kicking.
What were you doing before I got here? Monroe reaches out and grabs Minnie’s tit.
Thinkin’ about me? Minnie punches him again.

No! Monroe grabs her fists, pinning them behind her back, startling Minnie. Just when they’re about to kiss, Charlo comes in the front door. Monroe quickly pushes Minnie awa from him, who falls to the ground.
Hello?
Oh. There you are.  21 22 18. Minnie watches Monroe kiss Charlotte from the ground.

Monroe Rutherford is the handsomest man in the world. INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BEDROOM - NIGHT 21 Minnie lies in bed with her tape recorder, it’s dark exce for the glow from her flashlight. There’s magic in the ai

(sotto into microphone) My mother’s friend Martin Chong sent her a poem. He’s one of many men who’s in love with her, waiting in line with a number in their hand like at the deli counter. He wrote it on a piece of lacy purple rice paper that I found crumpled in the trash. I think it’s beautiful: Minnie reads from the crumpled paper. Stars start to eman from Minnie’s bed, floating out into the universe.

(into microphone) “It would have been better To have slept and dreamed Than to watch the night pass And the slow moon sink.” The ceiling of her room melts away, the stars twinkle abo her. She touches her body nonchalantly.

I wonder if Monroe is masturbating thinking about me tonight? Monroe says I exude sexuality. Sometimes I look in the mirror and I can’t believe what I see. I just realized - I’ve had breasts for a full three years. She clicks the light off. The stars twinkle for one more moment. INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BATHROOM - DAY 22 Minnie runs into the bathroom with a yellow rotary phone, receiver pressed up to her ear.  23 24 Pink (01/08/2014) 19.
(into phone) Sorry. Sorry. Gretel was following me. Hold on. She locks the door and sits on the edge of the tub.
(into phone) Okay, I’m good. KIMMIE’S VOICE Alright, tell me.

INT. KIMMIE’S HOUSE - BATHROOM - DAY 23 KIMMIE MINTER, sixteen but with the body of a twenty-one old and the hair of Farrah Fawcett, is on the other end. MINNIE’S VOICE (whispered) I can’t tell you, you have to guess. Kimmie sits straight up.
(into phone) You fucked somebody! !
INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BATHROOM - CONTINUOUS 24

(screaming into phone) What?! How did you know? A pounding at the door. GRETEL’S VOICE (calling through the door) Minnie. I need the bathroom. What are you doing? KIMMIE’S VOICE FINALLY! You’re catching up.  Pink (01/08/2014) 20.
Hey! We don’t all lose our virginity at thirteen. KIMMIE’S VOICE It’s not just me. That’s how it is in South San Francisco. Gretel pounds again. KIMMIE’S VOICE (CONT'D) I’m just so happy! Who was it?
(into phone) You have to guess. Gretel is listening. GRETEL’S VOICE (calling through the door) I am not. You’re so full of yourself.
25 INT. KIMMIE’S HOUSE - BATHROOM - CONTINUOUS 25 Kimmie curls her hair, perfecting her 70s flip.
(into phone) But you don’t know any guys. Wait. Was it that guy who works in the liquor store? That cute one? MINNIE’S VOICE (leading) No.
(into phone) Well, is it somebody I know? MINNIE’S VOICE Yes.
(into phone) I can’t think of anyone... wait a minute. It’s not Monroe, is it?

Pink (01/08/2014) 21. 26 INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BATHROOM 26 Minnie is silent, smiling like the cat who ate the canary Gretel pounds on the door. KIMMIE’S VOICE (screaming from the phone) My god! Minnie! That is so sick! Minnie has to hold the phone away from her ear. KIMMIE’S VOICE (CONT'D) Ewww! Gretel pounds. GRETEL’S VOICE (yelling through the door) I’m gonna tell mom. Get out of there!
(whispered into phone) Don’t you think he’s cute?
27 INT. KIMMIE’S HOUSE - BATHROOM - CONTINUOUS 27 Kimmie’s hair starts to burn. She unrolls the curling iro
(into phone) No, he’s not cute. He’s old. Ew, ew, ewww. Minnie. He sleeps with your mom!
28 INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BATHROOM - CONTINUOUS 28

(into phone, sotto) Only because he has to otherwise she'll suspect something. KIMMIE’S VOICE I don’t know, Minnie. Don’t you kinda feel like he’s taking advantage of you or something? I Mean, you’re so much younger than him.  22. Gretel’s pounding on the door grows louder and faster. KIMMIE’S VOICE (CONT'D) Minnie?
(upset, into phone) Umm...
29 INT. KIMMIE’S HOUSE - BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS 29 There is a pause.
(into phone) How big is his dick? 30 INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - HALLWAY - MOMENTS LATER 30 Minnie swings the door open to find Gretel about to pound the door. She grabs her, punching her on the arm.
I’m gonna kill you!
Ow. Minnie, don’t.
Quit spying on me. Minnie pushes Gretel to the ground, and sits on top of he smacking her over and over again.
What were you talking about? Ow- Minnie pushes Gretel’s face further into the carpet.
Minnie sits at the back of the streetcar. She talks into tape player’s mic, enjoying her lurid narrative, while an lady nearby listens on, disturbed.
He’s fucked me three times now. All I can think about is the fucking.  32 23. Flashback: Minnie and Monroe fucking in his car.

Monroe is a good lay from what I know in my limited knowledge. He is very tall and strong and he has two strong muscular thighs and a big hairy chest. Flashback: Minnie and Monroe fucking in his bed, fucking his floor, more fucking.
As for myself, I’m not particularly attractive at all. But I do think I look different now- probably my aura. And I think people are noticing...
Minnie sits at a desk by the window. The hippie ENGLISH TEACHER sits on his desk - “cool teacher” style, with a c of Catcher in the Rye in his lap.

I agree, Liza. Mr. Antolini doesn’t act like an authority figure. He isn’t condescending. But what did you make of the moment where he touched Holden’s forehead while he slept? The teacher drones on. Minnie doodles listlessly. A note lands on her desk. It reads: Write me a note. Minnie look around. Behind her, a very handsome boy with great hair, junior named RICKY WASSERMAN, 17, winks. Minnie drops the note back on Ricky’s desk. He unfurls it reading: A basic pancake recipe includes water, flour, ba powder, sugar and eggs. COOL ENGLISH TEACHER (CONT’D) Holden’s attitude toward homosexuals is called into question... The note drops back on Minnie’s desk: Madame, my heart contains nothing but admiration for you. The bell rings, Minnie gathers her things. Ricky and his friend ARNIE, another junior, blond and tall and preppy, surround her desk.  24.
Don’t listen to this bullshit artist. You should probably write notes to me.
He’s just jealous because he can tell you like me.
Oh really?
You're fascinating, you know that?
She's kinda looks like Angelica Houston, don’t you think?

I see that. Angelica Houston is incredibly beautiful. Ricky flashes a winning smile. Minnie is flattered, and m Moments later, a long-haired slacker boy named CHUCK, 16, with a skateboard under his arm, approaches.
What did they want?
Who?
Tweedle Dee and Tweedle Dipshit. They watch Ricky and Arnie leave.
They're nice.
They're preppy and rich.
Oh, don’t be jealous, Chuck. Just because Ricky Wasserman thinks I’m fascinating. Minnie and Chuck start to walk toward the door together.
He didn’t say that.  33 34 25. Minnie laughs.
I know. It’s so embarrassing.
Tell him to fuck off next time.
No one that popular has ever talked to me before. It was kinda exhilarating. As Minnie and Chuck pass the teacher's desk, he calls out
Ms. Goetze - next time I expect some more participation from you, I know you did the reading. Minnie nods reluctantly on her way out.

head_text.subj: FOOTAGE OF THE PATTY HEARST TRIAL 33

text: Patty Hearst being sentenced. INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - THE LIVING ROOM - EARLY EVENING 34 Minnie comes in from school to find Monroe and Charlotte smoking a joint, and drinking around the coffee table as though nothing has happened.

I just think it’s barbaric that she was found guilty! Even if she knew what she was doing in that bank - she was still a prisoner... Minnie turns on the TV, looking to Monroe to see if he’s going to acknowledge her. He doesn’t. She stares at him. CHARLOTTE (CONT’D) ..-Kidnapped, raped! Come on. She’s a victim!

(grasping) I don’t know. I guess it does seem kinda counter-progressive or something.  35 26. Monroe takes a long drag. He looks between Minnie and Charlotte, on either side. Minnie turns up the TV volume.
(loudly over the TV) It’s bullshit. It’s fascist, misogynistic bullshit. You need to pay more attention to this stuff. Read the paper every once in a while.

Yeah, you've said that. Charlotte shoots the rest of her drink, and exits for a refill. Monroe, unsure, finally decides to follow Charlot into the kitchen. As he passes behind Minnie, he reaches and tickles her neck. She slaps his hand away.
Hey.
Don’t.
Turn down the volume, bucko. Monroe exits to the kitchen, Minnie seething. From the kitchen, she can hear Charlotte’s giggles. Minnie sinks i the couch.

INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS 35 Minnie stands in front of her mirror, wrapped in a towel. pulls the picture Monroe took of her after their first ti out from her pocket and slides it into the edge of the mirror.

(earnest asking) What’s the point of living if nobody loves you? Nobody sees you? Nobody touches you? She drops her towel and stands naked. She compares the picture with her face in the mirror. And looks at her bod  Pink (01/08/2014) 27.
I wish I were older than I am. It feels like there are little weights hanging from my heart that swing and tug every time I move, every time the wind blows.
36 INT. MONROE’S APARTMENT - DAY 36 Minnie and Monroe’s faces are close together.
What’s your favorite color?
I don’t know. Blue? Why are you asking me such stupid questions?
37 INT. MINNIE’S HOUSE - BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS 37 Minnie is still in front of the mirror, looking at her fa
I want someone to be so totally in love with me that they would feel like they would die if I were gone. She looks at the picture.
Maybe Monroe could love me like that? I am so warm. I want a body with mine. I need a man.
38 INT. MONROE’S APARTMENT - DAY 38 Minnie and Monroe are having rousing sex under the covers with just the random limb poking out. Monroe finishes and collapses on top of Minnie.
(frustrated) No, don’t stop.  39 Yellow (01/16/2014) 28.
Minnie, come on. Monroe rolls off of her. Minnie stares at the ceiling, bl balled. She climbs on top of his back, but he’s already falling asleep.
We have to stop this. You just... have some hold on me.
Why would you say that? Do you think I’m fat? She punches him. He laughs.
You're so fucking confusing... with your adult codes and bullshit.
Minnie-
